reviews.comments: Muy buena experiencia en la cabin. Tiene todo lo que precisábamos para estar cómodos. Nos recibieron muy bien y la estadía fue muy buena, muy recomendable!
Todo re lindo chicos. Muy tranquilo. Recomendable 100%

MUY ATENTOS JEREMIAS Y SU PAPA, AMABLES Y CORDIALES.
TUVIMOS UNAS VACACIONES INOLVIDABLES.
SIN DUDAS VAMOS A VOLVER.

La casa de Jeremías es hermosa, cálida, luminosa y bien ventilada. La ducha es abundante y la cama muy cómoda. La vista es bellísima y el deck es el lugar ideal para relajarse después de un día de caminata o cualquier otra actividad. Nos gustó mucho! Muchas gracias, Jeremías!

No está preparado para recibir bebés ni niños. En verano hace mucho calor y no cuenta con aire acondicionado ni ventilador. La sugerencia de abrir las ventanas funciona parcialmente porque entran muchos bichos. 

El anfitrión es cordial y la cabaña contaba con utensilios (básicos, pava y cafetera). Bien la limpieza en general.
Estuvo todo bien, y la persona que te recibe es muy amable!

Hermosa la casa, muy limpia, cómoda y equipada con detalles de diseño y todo de alta calidad. La vista preciosa y la gente muy buena onda y amable. Gracias por todo! Si volvemos a Bariloche, vamos a querer volver a hospedarnos acá!
Simplemente excelente, nunca nos sentimos tan en casa como en esta vez... Seguramente nos veamos pronto! Saludos!
El dpto es precioso y la comunicación con Jeremías muy buena, al igual que con sus padres.

La cabaña es tal cual lo que muestran las fotos. Con todo lo necesario para sentirse calentitos, cómodos y como en casa. Si bien se encuentra alejada del centro, nos manejamos en colectivo y la parada se encuentra a sólo 2 cuadras, siendo que pasan bastante seguido varias líneas (50, 51 van al centro en 10´). La atención tanto del anfitrión como de sus padres ha sido excelente. Recomendamos 100% esta cabaña. Bariloche es hermoso! gracias por todo y esperamos volver!
reviews.response:
Gracias chicos.
este verano los esperamos con nueva sorpresa ;)

reviews.comments: Nos pareció un loft  muy lindo y cálido. Muy completo y una excelente iluminación natural!!!
reviews.response: Gracias Roberto por elegirnos , los esperamos de nuevo en cuanto puedan ;-)

reviews.comments:
La cabaña es tan linda como en las fotos y es de muy fácil acceso por transporte público. 
Hermosa la luz natural durante el día (con vista al lago) y de noche con la calidez de las lámparas, con todas las comodidades durante esta época del año (calefacción, agua caliente y ropa de cama) y muchos detalles adorables (como la rosa de recibida y las fotos antiguas del lugar).
Jeremías y sus papás, siempre atentos sin ser invasivos, fueron los anfitriones ideales. Recomendaremos su rinconcito en el mundo a cada amigo y familiar que pase unos días por Bariloche!
reviews.response: Gracias Albertina, Muy buena comunicación con mis padres , dejaron todo impecable !!! esta bienvenidos cuando gusten ;)

reviews.comments: La casita es hermosa, divina decorada y nueva. Es tal cual las fotos. El barrio no es lejos del centro pero se necesita transporte para llegar, llega la linea de colectivo 50 desde el centro. El barrio es muy bonito, familiar. Muy atento Jeremias y su papa, Todo genial espero volver pronto

Excelente locación, no muy lejos del centro y perfecto para descansar de la ciudad, nos quedamos muy contentos con la cabañita, hermosa en todo sentido y muy práctica, Esperamos volver en algún momento!

Mejor de lo que esperábamos! La cabaña es impecable, muy cálida y se disfruta muchísimo; en una zona tranquila con una hermosa vista y a pocos metros supermercado, algunos comercios y transporte público.
Jeremias es un gran anfitrión, seguramente volveremos!
Es una casa impecable , posee todo lo necesario para una estadía óptima

Nuestra estadía en Bariloche fue increíble!Jeremías nos recibió con mucha amabilidad y buena onda. La cabaña es hermosa, muy cómoda, cálida y luminosa. El deck es fantástico para sentarse a tomar algo y disfrutar de la vista. Está ubicada en una zona tranquila, con muchos jardines y árboles, pero a pocas cuadras hay negocios, un supermercado y paradas de colectivo, lo cual es muy conveniente para quienes viajan sin auto. También es muy linda zona para caminar. 
Un lugar para volver y recomendar :)
La casa en increíble, tal como se ve en las fotos. Todo anda perfecto, gran ducha. Una vista divina y excelente anfitrión.
Todo impecable, la cabaña es tal cual la publicación, y los anfitriones no pueden ser más atentos. Super recomendable.
reviews.response:
Gracias Franco, Yo diría impecable su estadía !!! ya saben el dicho , mi casa es la tuya !!!
ya los espero este invierno!!!
see you sun!!!

reviews.comments: Local realmente lindo, listo para descansar y disfrutar de esta hermosa ciudad. Los dueños muy amables y prestativos, ayudaron en todo lo que necesitamos. Hospedaje más que recomendado.
Es un lugar soñado, cuidado en cada detalle para que te sientas como en casa. Así lo sentimos nosotros. La calidez humana es destacable. Para recomendar y volver! Gracias por todo!

Disfrutamos tanto de la estadía que ya decidimos que la Patagonia es también venir a la cabaña de Jere y Calin. Nos trataron increíble, la cabaña cálida y hermosa con todo lo necesario. La vista preciosa. La calefacción justa, el baño impecable, el agua de la ducha perfecta, la decoración simple y delicada. Para los que les preocupa la seguridad, nos encantó estar en un predio donde hay dos cabañas más, que aunque estén bien distanciadas al haber movimiento de personas sentimos que el lugar estaba monitoreado. Queremos agradecer a Tania ( Responsable del servicio) por su asistencia permanente y su buena onda.
Buena vida para todos.

La cabaña es super cómoda, están muy bien aprovechados los metros. Si bien esta en un barrio, en 5 minutos tenes supermercado, Roticeria y otros negocios. No Tiene televisión, pero funciona muy bien Internet Tania, que es quien hace las veces de contacto es amorosa y todos responden a cualquier consulta enseguida. Muy recomendable

Muy buena predisposición por parte del anfitrión para que todo esté perfecto. Mucha comunicación y veracidad con la descripción de la publicación. El encargado de la casa siempre estuvo atento a nuestros pedidos, y muy cordial con nosotros. El barrio es muy lindo, y desde la ventana del dormitorio se visualiza el Lago Nahuel Huapi. Nosotros nos movimos en colectivo, y resultó un poco agotador subir por las calles empinadas, pero si van con auto sería lo ideal. A unas cuadras hay un supermercado, una remisería, y las paradas de colectivo que van al Centro y al Cerro Catedral. La casa tiene muy buena calefacción, indispensable para los días de invierno en Bariloche. Sin dudas, súper recomendable!!!
Exelente experiencia muy linda cabaña  ,la verdad muy acogedora ,en un barrio tranquilo,calefacción muy buena y mucha luz en el ambiente

La estadía fue muy buena. La casa esta nueva y es aún más linda de lo que se ve en las fotos. La cocina tiene todos los elementos básicos necesarios para cocinar, bien calefacción así, todo impecable. El barrio es muy accesible en bus y hay tiendas cercanas. Los papas de Jeremías nos recibieron cálidamente y estuvieron atentos a nuestras necesidades, aún estando en casas separadas. Lo recomiendo

La cabaña es genial, muy linda, sus instalaciones y  utensilios son totalmente nuevas, posee un excelente sistema de calefacción (fundamental en el invierno). Esta ubicada en el barrio residencial Melipel, accesible y tranquilo, lejos de los estudiantes ( viajes de egresados)  pero a menos de diez minutos en auto del centro. El trato fue súper cálido, nos encontramos con la madre de Jeremías, pero sin embargo el y Caline estuvieron atentos enviándonos mensajes durante toda la estadía. El punto perfecto entre atención y la libertad de tener una cabaña separada de la casa principal. Nos ofrecieron te, café , azúcar y endulzante. 
Súper recomendable!!
Excelente lugar, muy cálido y hermoso. 100% recomendable !
Un gran lugar, relajado y tranquilo.

El espacio súper bonito. A pesar del frío la casa mantiene el calor. La vista es hermosa y el barrio es muy tranquilo. A pesar de no estar en el centro el acceso es muy sencillo porque está cerca a la parada de buses. Perfecto para unos días de descanso.

Nos encantó! Disfrutamos mucho. Justo lo que buscábamos, intimidad, sentirnos en casa. Las fotos no engañan.... Nosotros no llevábamos auto. Aún así no tuvimos problema, la parada del transporte público esta cerca.
Muchas gracias Jeremías!

Cabaña hermosa, gran vista, comodidad y decoración. Ideal para unas vacaciones en pareja. 
Muy acogedora y calentita, disfrutamos muchísimo de nuestra estadía.
La ubicación nos encantó ya que estaba cerca del centro y todos los servicios pero un poco alejada para poder disfrutar de la tranquilidad del lugar.

Sin dudas volveremos pronto!!!

Un lugar increíble , alejando del centro sobrevalorado de bariloche. 
Este lugar ha sido un paraíso para realmente disfrute de la belleza natural del lugar.
Gracias y esperamos volver pronto
No llegamos a disfrutar de la casa por motivos de salud, pero el anfitrión estuvo siempre a nuestra disposición siendo muy amable y atento.
reviews.response: espero sobre todo que estes bien!!! siguen por argentina.?

reviews.comments: Great, quiet location outside of town with a nice view of the lake. Very clean and Jeremias communicated so quickly if I had a question.
Beautiful and simple home. We loved our stay here. Its a great location close to public bus stop and just far enough away from the busyness of the Center.
Great stay! Thanks
Great location near the bus stop, restaurants, stores, and the grocery store. Beautiful, unique tiny home with plenty of space. Attentive host always willing to help.

Nice cabin equipped with everything you need. The upstairs area is perfect for storing your luggage. The huge windows allow a perfect view on the lake and the mountains. It is stunning. The cabin is, as described, a bit off the city center. You can surely take the bus or walk, but car will be most convenient. We had a great time there and in Bariloche and would definitely recommend staying with Jeremias.
We had an amazing stay in Bariloche! Jeremias was very hospitable and helped answer all our questions, and the cabin was beautiful. We hope to return soon. Thank you!

Loved staying here and felt immediately at home.  It's a stylish, rustic cabaña with wonderful views of the lake and mountains.  Jerimias and his father were very welcoming and checked if I needed anything.  At the same time, they let me enjoy the cabaña, which had everything I needed for 3 nights.  2 blocks to the supermarket, 3km from the centre of Bariloche - easy to get to by bus/taxi/on foot.  1 or 2 blocks from main bus lines to see points of interest.  Definitely recommended - wished I could have stayed longer and enjoyed those views some more!

Patagonian cabin is a very special place. Unique architecture, scenic ambience and increíble views of the lake make it the ideal place to stay in Bariloche. Cesar, Jeremias' father was my host and he was so charming and attentive. Highly recommended!
Beautiful place within a 5 minute walk to public transportation. Could be hard to walk in the winter months, but pretty much worth it.

A estadia foi ótima!! Única coisinha que deixou a desejar um pouco foi o calefactor que não ficava tão quente como gostaríamos, e por conta disso o banheiro era um gelo rs a água do chuveiro também era sempre morna, muito às vezes ficava quente.. mas fora isso foi tudo maravilhoso, quem nos entregou a casa pode entregar 1h depois do combinado, mas acabamos saindo quase 1h depois também, então não houve problemas. A vista é linda, a casa é linda, é muito aconchegante. Tem um onibus que leva ao centro há 2 quadras e é um bairro muito tranquilo. Gostamos da nossa estadia!!

It was a very cool experience all around. Nice and helpful host, very nice, comfortable and clean place. The distance to the center of the city was the only thing we didn't love, but there were buses and a close supermarket that made it easier. At the end of the day we were very happy with our stay.

A casa é muito funcional, bonita mas achamos um pouco longe. Definitivamente é preciso de um carro para se locomover em bariloche. Acho que falta um secador de cabelos uma vez que o clima é muito frio e um microondas. O banheiro achei muito exposto, com uma janela pra rua, poderiam colocar uma cortina. No geral, a casa é boa, cumpre o que promete.

The home is very cute, looks just like the photos, and the parents of the host that live on the property were incredible and will do anything for you. They even spoke English to us which was very helpful with our poor Spanish skills! The air bnb host is living in Switzerland. Host communication with on site check in was not well communicated. We waited outside for 40 minutes in the cold. Also when the ladder to the upstairs level was not provided the host's response was unapologetic and he asked me to fix the problem by discussing it with his father who lives on the property.

We loved staying in Jeremais's cabin. Although he was away in Europe, his mother welcomed us into this cozy, quiet, well appointed cabin. Was the perfect place for us to access Cerro Catedral and then relax in the afternoon after skiing. Would highly recommend staying here.

Local prático, parece uma casa de boneca, local tranquilo, com uma adorável vista do lago, com mercado, farmácia, ponto de ônibus, se você procura um local tranquilo é perfeito, o Sr. César e sua esposa são muito gentis.

Excelente opção de estadia em Bariloche, a casa é muito linda com uma decoração minimalista e bastante funcional. Apesar de possuir ponto ônibus próximo a casa, o ideal para locomoção em Bariloche é de carro (aluguel) ou estar preparado para andar de táxi ou remis.
reviews.response:
gracias chicos por su estadia 
dejaron todo muy bien

reviews.comments: We had a great stay in the cabin. Its a bit outside the centre, but eqsily accessible with car. The cabin had everything we needed, plus the view in the morning is fantastic. The hosts where very friendly and helpful. Definately recommend anyone to stay here

Cute little house on the mountain side. Included all necessary kitchen cooking dishes/utensils. Walkable to bus stops, super markets and restaurants. Jeremias wasn't around when we arrived but his parents offered to pick us up and drop us off at the airport for the same price as taxi. About a 40 minute walk to downtown Bariloche, which was nice to enjoy the scenic views and fresh air. We ended up renting a car to explore the city and the lakes easier, definitely recommended if you have the ability to do so as well.
Great spot.  Bariloche is beautiful and this place is a perfect jumping off point to explore the breathtaking area.

Nice stay at this cute and cosy cabin. It is bright and airy, well equipped with all the stuff you need to cook at home. We didn't meet Jeremia but his parents are really lovely and friendly and were always willing to help us out.
Only main issue was communication with Jeremia was a bit poor, so his parents weren't expecting us on arrival however they were so nice and quickly made the cabin ready for us.

Had an excellent stay - Jeremias was a fantastic host and very willing to help on anything I needed during my stay.

The unit was fantastic and exactly what I was looking for to get away for a few days.

Our stay in this place was awesome. The house was amazing, the location was great (it's good if you have a car). Jeremias was very welcoming and informative regarding everyting. If you're out of ideas regarding trips in bari don't hesitate to ask him for advice, this guy knows te area for real! Overall a great stay, and this is coming from a couple that can be rather critical. I actually never write reviews on the places I stay... 

Enjoy!!
reviews.response: thank for staying with us , you guys were really great guests , you are welcome back anytime

reviews.comments: A nice cabin with large windows and a view of the lake. It's several km out of town, so a car is ideal. The local bus system could also be used to get around. There is a big supermarket about 6 blocks away to buy food.
Wonderful little cabin, an especially lovely place to stay if you want to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city center. Thank you!

Hola,

Jeremia & Calin's place is very nice, modern, and equipped. My contacts there, Tania and Leo were very helpful and extremely friendly. There are many restaurants and stores within walking distance and the city centre is a five minute bus ride away. The view of the lake is spectacular and to the rear of the property are the mountains and Cerro Otto which is also within walking distance. I would stay there again!!

Ciao.....Bill
It is a nice and quiet place. We really appreciated that. The cabin is cosy, well equipped, modern and very clean. We spent a wonderful time there and it was the perfect place for christmas.
reviews.response:
thank you Vera!
happy new year and safe trip! lovely having sporty people!!! :)

reviews.comments: We had a perfect time in the Patagonian-style cabine. Everything was just as described. Maybe the only remark we can bring is to have a more comfortable bed, it was a bit small. But we are tall people so probably that wouldn't be a problem for others. And to have a bit more privacy when all the curtains are open by putting some white cotton ones that let the light go trough but the people can't see you from the other house in the back. Sometimes we felt a bit exposed during the day. We didn't expected so many neighbours. For the rest  we felt immediately at home.

Nice private cabin to enjoy Bariloche and its surroundings! The cabin is modernly furnished with all the equipment you need. The place is not in the centre of Bariloche but enough shops/restaurants nearby! We enjoyed our stay very much!

We LOVED this place!! We’ve done a lot of traveling in South America and this is definitely one of the best places we have ever stayed. We work online while we travel, which means we end up spending more time inside than the average tourist, but this place was the perfect space to do so! Wifi is fast, the kitchen is equipped with everything you need, and you can even flush toilet paper down the toilet!! Aesthetically, the cabin incredibly charming with it’s modern design and all of the details of the decor are so unique. We loved hanging out on the patio deck after a long hike in the afternoon or in the evening with drinks. **Also, if you are worried about the loft bed, they recently moved it down the the main level, so don’t let that hinder you from booking. It was actually really nice to have everything on the main level and then store our luggage and gear out of sight in the loft room. 

The neighborhood is really safe and nice. A short walk to a super market and laundry shop and close to several bus stops that will take you anywhere you want to go!

Thank you Jeremias and Calin for a great stay!
reviews.response:
gracias chicos!!!
lovely to have you home... and thanks so much for your comments,  happy to know you enjoyed it so much! 
nos encanto tenerlos en casa, la cabin es su casa para cuando quieran anytime again!
buen viaje!!!!

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 245 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is a great place to stay in Barlioche. The location is great, just hop into the bus 20 for the many tourist spots. Close to a laundry, market places, and many kiosks for recharging sube and phones.

The house itself was very clean, comfortable, and well taken care of.  Everything is new and lots of natural light. Very spacious and tons of outlets. 

Now, it's not very secluded. Neighbors within 50 meters on 3 sides. The kitchen has the basics so cooking was easy. Stove was small and a bit finicky but managed fine.

Jeremias very helpful, friendly, and speaks English very well. Enjoyed our 7 nights here!
Merveilleux séjour dans cette super cabane moderne au bord du lac !

This is a brand new cabin in a semi remote location, however easy walking to bus stops, coffee shop, supermarkets and a few restaurants. 
The cabin is so new that it wasn't really ready for guests as the amenities shown to have been included in the cabin were actually not, so it was very basic for our stay. Hopefully a lounge/couch, tea, coffee and wifi are sorted soon for future guests as it will then be a nice place to relax, for our short stay it was okay as we weren't there much. Also note that you must climb a ladder to get to the loft bedroom.
